name: PIXILFarm
description: PIXILfarm is a simple game about farming and reaching your goal of 70 coins. This game was for My First Game Jam: Winter 2023. If your having issues in game, try refreshing the page. I would love if you could comment any bugs or feedback you have! If you are having trouble seeing the corn, see if Fullscreen will make it better. I hope you enjoy! (There is probably a lot of bugs, I didn't have time to fix all of them.)
